<<<<<<< HEAD
Oroonoko a tragedy, as it is acted at the Theatre-Royal by His Majesty's servants / written by Tho. Southerne. Southerne, Thomas, 1660-1746. Congreve, William, 1670-1729. Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689. Oroonoko.
[8], 84, [2] p.
Printed for H. Playford ..., B. Tooke ..., and S. Buckley ..., London : 1696.
Based on Mrs. Behn's novel of the same name, which was partly founded on fact. Epilogue by Congreve. First edition. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

[8], 84, [2] p.
Printed for H. Playford ..., B. Tooke ..., and S. Buckley ..., London : 1696.
Based on Mrs. Behn's novel of the same name, which was partly founded on fact. Epilogue by Congreve. First edition. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
